author: Alexander Smith
title: 'Not the time': Global criticism grows on Trump move to end WHO funding
description: The decision by President Donald Trump to halt funding to the World Health Organization has been met with widespread criticism at home and abroad.
content: President Donald Trump's move to halt funding to the World Health Organization has been met with severe criticism at home and abroad, with the United Nations secretary-general saying "now is not the time" for such a drastic move while the coronavirus pandemic… [+3453 chars]
